HelpEntry.Text: The group of Factions the Faction belongs to. Used for grouping Factions in the UI.
Can the reputation level of the faction change based on player actions.
The default stance of the Faction when players and other factions first meet it.
The Other Faction this stance is towards.
The Default Stance towards the other Faction.

By default there are 6 stances that a Faction can have, each with a numerical value, and a reputation amount:
(-2) Hated: -3000 (-1) Disliked: -1500 (0) Neutral: -500 (1) Friendly: 500 (2) Honoured: 1500 (3) Exalted: 3000
